short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Just in case you're sick of all the recommended videos on your Netflix

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of the movies on Netflix? Hide them. 
Wanna stop binge-watching rom coms on Netflix? Hide them.
This extension hides all the recommended movies and shows on Netflix for you, and the only movies you'll see are those in your list.
